snippet.title: Sker Ritual - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist and follow on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1492070/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=tease
Subscribe for updates: https://www.walesinteractive.com/skerritual

The co-op survival FPS and spiritual successor to the award-winning occult horror, Maid of Sker. Play solo or up to 4 players to survive the supernatural onslaught of the Quiet Ones.

Coming to PC in Summer 2022 followed by consoles in 2022.

Follow Wales Interactive:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/WalesInter
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WalesInteractive
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/walesinteractive
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/WalesInteractive
Wales Interactive: https://www.walesinteractive.com

#SkerRitual #MaidofSker #FPS
